value.title: Pope Francis: Pray that robotics and AI always serve humankind
value.excerpt: Pope Francis has invited Catholics around the world to pray that robotics and artificial intelligence will remain always at the service of human beings.

value.title: This supermarket has purchased two robotics firms to take on Amazon
value.excerpt: UK online supermarket Ocado has acquired two robotics start-ups from the US as the company looks to boost efficiency in its warehouses. The purchase of San Francisco firm Kindred Systems for $262 million and Las Vegas-based Haddington Dynamics for $25 million in cash and shares should help the retailer introduce more automation solutions.

value.title: (A New) Class Is In Session: How To Incorporate AI In Education
value.excerpt: It’s time for schools to reevaluate their approach to teaching kids about a technology that’s only becoming more commonplace.

value.title: 3D-printed hearts, self-driving buses, and robots
value.excerpt: Technologies that were still largely in development or limited rollout a year ago are now becoming commonplace, including self-driving cleaning robots and automation in areas like fast food and delivery.

value.title: Walmart is giving up on shelf-scanning robots in favor of humans
value.excerpt: Walmart began using robots supplied by Bossa Nova Robotics in 2017, with initial deployments in 50 locations. The mobile robots would simplify routine work in stores, said the company, using machine vision to scan shelves and identify what products needed restocking.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Platform Reduces Hospital Admissions By Over 50% In Trial
value.excerpt: An artificial intelligence-based diagnostic tool has reduced hospital admissions by 51% among elderly patients identified by the tool as being high-risk, according to results of a trial released by health care provider Clare Medical.

value.title: Robot boats from MIT can now carry passengers
value.excerpt: The latest "Roboat" is an autonomous vehicle that's about six feet long and is being tested for use in Amsterdam.
